content: from lively colors to the lovely shell motif this crochet shawl is exquisitely styled worked in soft and luxurious caron colorama halo the yarn does all the colorwork for you featuring bright color gradients you ll do single_crochet chains double_crochet and half_double_crochet to create the lacy triangular shape shawl style lends itself well to a one-ball project so just keep crocheting until you run out of yarn​ materials caron® colorama halo™ perfect phasing™ 8 oz/227 g 481 yds/440 m blue raspberry 76020 2 cakes or 695 yds/630 m measurements approx 37 94 cm deep x 59 150 cm wide
